programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers attend a locker auction in Orange County, where Ivy Calvin ends up having to dig through a pile of rubbish.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: An autographed picture of John Belushi and a Jim Henson puppet arrive in the shop, but it remains to be seen if any of them are worth big money.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A rare Nepalese Bira gun from the late 1800s arrives in the shop, and a 1970s Bob Peak TWA mural makes a big impression.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Staff at the Detroit family pawn shop encounter a gynaecologist's table and an elephant's skull.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Les challenges Seth to a high-stakes sales competition, but later faces the most dangerous customer he has ever encountered.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: Rick and the team repair a 1960s popcorn machine, and a client brings in an antique air compressor.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: While Rick is away, his brother Ron takes matters into his own hands when a client brings in a 1900s love tester. Is this a match made in overhaul heaven?.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.sub-title: A Photo a Tooth the Truth?
programme.desc: Two potentially game-changing discoveries are made in the Ozarks as the investigation into whether giant humanoids ever roamed America continues.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: The 1979 investigation into the abduction and murder of an eight-year-old boy in Gary, Indiana, as police struggled to understand why anyone would want an innocent child dead.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: A famous cowboy offers his assistance to the bidders at an auction in Fort Worth, while Lesa finds a means to triumph over her rival.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: One of the buyers accidentally acquires a historically important item, while Victor gets his hands on an intriguing locked treasure chest - with no key.

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Extended edition. Question master Stephen Fry continues the comedy quiz's exploration of subjects beginning with the letter L as he asks a range of fiendish questions on the topic of liars and lying. Joining regular panellist Alan Davies are comedienne Sara Pascoe, Bad Education and Fresh Meat star Jack Whitehall, and stand-up and The Last Leg host Adam Hills.

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Comedy quiz show, hosted by Dara O Briain. Regular panellist Hugh Dennis looks back on events in news and politics, with the help of fellow comedians James Acaster, Tom Allen, Ed Byrne, Kerry Godliman and Tez Ilyas. Stand-up and improvisation are the name of the game as the contestants try to get one up on each other. First shown in July 2018.

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Extended edition. Question master Stephen Fry continues the comedy panel quiz's exploration of subjects beginning with the letter L as he asks a range of fiendish questions on the topic of ladies and gents. Joining regular panellist Alan Davies are stand-up comedian Ross Noble, Australian author Kathy Lette and comedienne and Great British Bake Off presenter Sue Perkins.

programme.desc: The world's most impressive disused railway bridges, including the biggest wooden trestle bridge in the world, which was closed down due to hurricane damage.

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: How, in 1940, the French Army suffered a heavy defeat after underestimating the Nazis' strength while relying on First World War strategies and equipment to defend its frontiers. Narrated by Laurence Olivier.

programme.title: Impossible Engineering
programme.desc: A look at the Shanghai Tower, which at a height of 632 metres is the second tallest building in the world, With a weight of 850,000 tons, it has been built to withstand winds of typhoon proportions.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: The discovery of a charred corpse in a disused railway tunnel sets Taggart on the gruesome hunt for a ruthless killer in an investigation with sinister undertones of black magic and voodoo. In an another twist, the wife of an arthritic dentist narrowly escapes a series of murder attempts, adding to a complex case for Taggart and his team. Starring Mark McManus, Blythe Duff and James MacPherson, and featuring a guest appearance by Annette Crosbie.

programme.title: Piers Morgan's Life Stories
programme.desc: Timothy West joins the host to look back on a five-decade career as one of Britain's best-loved actors. The former EastEnders star speaks candidly about his 52-year marriage to Fawlty Towers actress Prunella Scales, and the impact of her battle with dementia on their lives. He also reveals the trauma of his first wife's mental health problems, and how he finally made peace with his daughter after several years of estrangement. On a lighter note, Timothy also reflects on his role at the wedding of Prince Charles and Camilla Parker-Bowles, and the time he toured the set of Coronation Street - disguised as former Soviet president Mikhail Gorbachev.

programme.title: The Home Game
programme.desc: Homeowners compete to make the biggest profit from a major renovation, while interior design expert Linda Barker monitors their progress and appraises the end results. In the first edition, a Surrey kitchen diner sees some extravagant touches blow the budget, a father and daughter plan a high-cost low-maintenance garden makeover in Essex and a thrifty upcycler creates an amazing bedroom makeover in Kent.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Judge Rinder
programme.desc: Cameras follow criminal barrister Robert Rinder as he takes on real-life cases in a studio courtroom.

programme.title: 90s vs 00s: The Tearjerkers
programme.desc: It's time to grab the tissues and prepare yourself for the most sentimental songs from the ninties and noughties, we can't promise you won't shed a tear or two.

programme.title: Late Night Magic
programme.desc: We're taking you all the way through the night with soem of the best tracks of all time.

programme.title: Kisstory: Old Skool & Anthems

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Car restorer Wayne Carini has 48 hours to make a deal on a 1972 Ferrari Daytona Spyder.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne Carini takes a 1934 MG ND Magnette with a six cylinder engine to the Scottsdale Auction.

programme.title: Chaos Caught on Camera
programme.sub-title: Icy Impact, Flash Flood, Deadly Deer
programme.desc: Footage of more tales of human endurance, including a disaster caused by a flash flood.

programme.title: Chaos Caught on Camera
programme.sub-title: Invading Inferno, Gutsy Granny, Ambush Avalanche
programme.desc: More daunting footage illustrates the devastating impact of fire, and an elderly woman demonstrates remarkable levels of courage.

programme.title: Destroyed in Seconds
programme.desc: Argentinean firefighters battle explosions during a chemical blaze, a helicopter crashes at a Spanish air show and a landslide destroys a pit mine in Malaysia.

programme.title: Destroyed in Seconds
programme.desc: Sydney Airport is closed after a fire and explosion, a woman survives a tornado destroying her home and a $1million boat disintegrates after hitting a wall. Presented by Ron Pitts.

programme.title: American Loggers
programme.desc: The wet fall season cripples production, and just when things cannot seem to get worse, a crane operator's rig falls through a dilapidated bridge.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: Chip Foose and the team work on a 1972 Cutlass which has been brought out of storage to be repaired.

programme.title: FBI Case Files
programme.desc: Agents search for a nurse whose car has been found abandoned, and suspect one of her neighbours may have been involved in her disappearance.

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: Three murder investigations involving poison, including arsenic and potassium chloride - one of which requires toxicology tests on frozen tissue from the victim.

programme.title: Copycat Killers
programme.desc: An in-depth look at a murderer who seemingly paralleled the fictional character Patrick Bateman in American Psycho, hiding behind designer clothing and expensive sunglasses.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The case of 24-year-old Megan Sharpton, who was raped and murdered before her body was set alight in July 2012. The torment led to her mother committing suicide.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: The story of the Agofsky brothers, who abducted a banker from his home and forced him to open the vault at his workplace before throwing him off a bridge. It took the FBI five years to gather enough evidence to convict them.

programme.title: Animal Cops San Francisco
programme.desc: Rottweilers are seized following a fatal attack on their neighbour's dog and guinea pigs, and the team tries to rescue a kitten trapped in a carcass-strewn junkyard.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: A desperate owner hopes Lisa can save a cat that has been hit by a car, and Chris battles to save Homer the turtle after a vicious dog bite.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Dr Chris Brown experiences a difficult week as he treats everything from horses, wombats, monkeys and a mother in trouble.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: A bride looks for a dress that both she and her grandmother are happy with, while another customer wants to pay tribute to her own late grandmother with her gown.
